subject: Baseball
Football
lead_paragraph: It’s Hall of Fame voting time in baseball and pro football, and if I had a vote, I know which candidates I would vote for. I also know one candidate I would not vote for: Mark McGwire.
snippet: It’s Hall of Fame voting time in baseball and pro football, and if I had a vote, I know which candidates I would vote for. I also know one candidate I would not vote for: Mark McGwire.
